thread.section_title: Gamecheap Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gamecheap | gamecheap.net | 3 of 71
thread.title: Takahn Hunter

author: Takahn Hunter
title: Takahn Hunter
text: Due to my own lack of computer knowledge, I had some difficulty installing the Windows 10 software. However the person who helped me "Jordan Radermacher" in the customer service chat section really went above and beyond to help me with the issue. If this is the standard of customer service within this company then i have no reservations about saying this is the best customer service available as a consumer! Big companies have more than a thing or two to learn.
